name: Run Panda
description:
RUN RUN RUN!
Feel FREE to Run!
How Fast Can You Run?

PANDA RUN, JUMP, DASH, SLIDE, RUSH ACROBAT, ROLL, DODGE, DOUBLE JUMP and
SCRAMBLE against the oncoming Hurdles,
Get Coins, Collect Hearts to Save POO!
Earn FREE Coins and Panda Lives to Unlock Levels!

- Pandora Jungle Run
- Temple Run Forest
- Safari Desert Run
- Hawaii Beach
- New York City Rush
- Panda Jump City Run

Beat Score of your friends and people around the world.

Join the most addictive fun Panda rush, and become the best city run,
A Universal Game With HD Optimized Graphics.

Upgrade Powerups to increase the duration of... its similar to kungfu panda run game.
- Coins Magnet: Collect Coins in bulk with a Powerful Magnet.
- Jetpack Ride: Collect Coins in skies without a Hurdle.
- 2x Multiplier: Double your Running Score.


FEATURES

- Beautiful organic environments
- Different Levels to play in City Run, subway, forest and beach
- Upgrade panda pop Powerups
- Gorgeous HD Graphics
- One Thumb Control
- Game Services Integration
- Lots of obstacle-dodging fun!
- Super double jump
- 2x score multiplier
- Jetpack Ride
- Gem
- Coins Magnet
- Endless runner game
- Easy Gameplay
